about.title: About Sweet Home
about.copy: At Sweet Home, we turn property goals into real-life keys. From your first chat to closing day, our friendly experts guide you with clear advice, curated options, and stress-free support. Ready to move forward with confidence? Let's find the place that truly feels like home.

services.title: Our Services
services.brief: From tailored consulting to hands‑on management and financing guidance, our team helps you buy, sell and manage property with confidence.

calc.title: Mortgage Calculator
calc.subtitle: Calculate your monthly mortgage payments and understand your financing options

errors.invalid: Please enter valid values for all fields.
errors.downTooHigh: Down payment cannot be greater than or equal to property price.

testimonials.title: What our clients say about us

consulting.title: Property Consulting
consulting.copy: Strategic advice for buying or selling residential assets. We benchmark local comps, build the pricing strategy, prepare the marketing narrative, and negotiate on your behalf to achieve the strongest outcome.

management.title: Property Management
management.copy: Hands‑on, end‑to‑end management: tenant sourcing and screening, contracts and check‑ins, rent collection, preventative maintenance and repairs, and monthly performance reporting—so your investment stays hassle‑free.

finance.title: Financial Services
finance.copy: Independent financing guidance: mortgage pre‑assessment, lender introductions, yield modeling and cash‑flow planning, plus tax‑aware structures with our trusted partners to optimise returns.

intro.title: About Sweet Home
intro.copy: At Sweet Home, we turn property goals into real-life keys. From your first chat to closing day, our friendly experts guide you with clear advice, curated options, and stress-free support. Ready to move forward with confidence? Let's find the place that truly feels like home.

404.title: Page Not Found
404.hint: The page you’re looking for doesn’t exist or may have been moved.

500.title: Something went wrong
500.heading: An unexpected error occurred
500.hint: Please try again. If the problem persists, contact support.

cookies.title: Cookies Policy
cookies.intro: We use necessary cookies to make our site work and analytics cookies to improve it. You can control cookies in your browser settings.

types.title: Types of Cookies
types.body: Essential (required for core functionality), analytics (to understand usage), and marketing (to personalize offers).

manage.title: Manage Cookies
manage.body: Most browsers allow you to block or delete cookies. Disabling some cookies may affect site functionality.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: We respect your privacy. This policy explains what data we collect, how we use it, and your rights.

controller.title: Data Controller
controller.body: Sweet Home Real Estate Investments ("we", "us") is the controller of your personal data. Contact: Site@Sweet-Home.co.il

collection.title: Data We Collect
collection.body: We may collect contact details, enquiry content, property preferences, usage data (analytics), cookies, and technical data to provide and improve our services.

use.title: How We Use Your Data
use.body: To respond to enquiries, provide property recommendations, manage appointments, send transactional emails, improve the website, prevent fraud, and comply with legal obligations.

legalBasis.title: Legal Bases
legalBasis.body: Performance of a contract or pre‑contractual steps, legitimate interests (e.g. analytics, security), consent (where required), and legal obligations.

sharing.title: Sharing
sharing.body: We may share data with trusted processors (hosting, email, analytics), partner agents (with your consent or when necessary), and authorities where legally required.

intl.title: International Transfers
intl.body: Your data may be processed outside your country. We use appropriate safeguards such as Standard Contractual Clauses where required.

retention.title: Retention
retention.body: We keep data only as long as necessary for the purposes stated, or as required by law.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.body: You have the right to access, rectify, erase, restrict, object, and data portability. You can also withdraw consent. Contact us to exercise your rights.

cookies.title: Cookies & Analytics
cookies.body: We use necessary cookies and analytics to improve the site. Manage your preferences in your browser settings. See also our Cookies Policy.

contact.title: Contact
contact.body: For privacy requests, email Site@Sweet-Home.co.il or write to our Berlin office address in the Contact page.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: These terms govern your use of our website and services. By accessing our website, you agree to these terms.

use.title: Use of Service
use.body: You agree to use the site lawfully and not to misuse contact forms or interfere with the website. You must be at least 18 years old to submit enquiries.

content.title: Content & Accuracy
content.body: Property details and prices are provided in good faith and may change. We do not guarantee availability until confirmed by an agent.

accounts.title: Accounts
accounts.body: If you create an account, you are responsible for safeguarding credentials and for activity under your account. Notify us of any unauthorized use.

thirdParty.title: Third‑Party Services
thirdParty.body: We integrate third‑party tools (e.g., maps, analytics). Their terms and privacy policies apply where relevant.

liability.title: Liability
liability.body: To the maximum extent permitted by law, we disclaim warranties and limit liability for indirect or consequential damages arising from use of the site.

changes.title: Changes
changes.body: We may update these terms. Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance.

contact.title: Contact
contact.body: Questions about these terms? Contact us via the Contact page.

detail.getInTouch: Get in touch with our team for more information
detail.messagePlaceholder: Tell us about your interest in this project...

noResults.hint: Try adjusting your search criteria or browse all available projects.

footer.tagline: The best team that you will ever need.
